revision.comment: Omega moved page [[SMC SMCD3GNV v2?]] to [[SMC SMCD3GNV2]]
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMCD3GN |revision=V v2 (3A) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/19/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Hitron |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,cable modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=JI5-DORY3A |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-120 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=C7P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETC4800 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL128PIF |fla1_num=2 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU64M16GG-AC |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe (oversized) |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMP-N14 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3883 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=HOME-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^HOME-[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=10.0.0.1 |default_user=cusadmin |default_pass=highspeed |oui= |oui_eth= }} The default SSID appears to be '''HOME-XXXX''' where '''XXXX''' :is the last two octets of the wireless interface MAC address
Default settings are per the FCC manual.
"PN:382208100202-10" is silkscreened on the RT3883 module: :WiSoC: [[Ralink]] RT3883F @500 MHz 3T3R (iNIC) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5SV8M16HS-6K (16MB)
